channel.title: Opportunities to Play! Games with Open Seats Available 2019/04/29 thru 2019/05/05
channel.description:
Hey folks!
In this post, we will highlight games for the upcoming week which have open seats and therefore the opportunity to add some more gaming fun to your week.
### [ Cute Boys Holding Hands: An HGMO Hack ](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbxWqH4C8Dsb-WeRM1y)
[date=2019-04-29 time=15:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-04-29 time=18:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] Cute Boys Holding Hands is a game about a budding relationship between two boys at a South Yorkshire grammar school in the Summer of 1984, at the height of the Miners Strike. In some ways polar opposites, the boys are united by their outsider status at the school. Between us, we will play the two boys, Simon and Jack, their English teacher Miss Rayne, and Simon’s closest friend Jo. (If we are able to play two games, we will swap roles after the first) Each role has specific actions they are (or are not) able to take throughout the game, and we will play to find out how Simon and Jack’s relationship grows in physical and emotional intensity, and how they deal with the struggles in their lives.
### [ Never Tell Me the Odds: Ol' Hallelujah ](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-La60tsnPoSGmnznCImW)
[date=2019-04-29 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-04-29 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] YOU ARE A SPACEFARING SCOUNDREL. You’ve blasted, cheated, swindled, double-crossed, charmed, and hyper- jumped your way across HALF THE GALAXY. But now, you’ve made a few bad decisions and gotten into some REAL TROUBLE. The one thing in all the universe that you really care about is in terrible danger, and keeping it safe might require the ULTIMATE SACRIFICE. Are you desperate enough to risk everything you have to SAVE WHAT MATTERS MOST?
### [ Cute Boys Holding Hands: An HGMO Hack ](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbxWqH4C8Dsb-WeRM1y)
[date=2019-04-30 time=15:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-04-30 time=18:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] Cute Boys Holding Hands is a game about a budding relationship between two boys at a South Yorkshire grammar school in the Summer of 1984, at the height of the Miners Strike. In some ways polar opposites, the boys are united by their outsider status at the school. Between us, we will play the two boys, Simon and Jack, their English teacher Miss Rayne, and Simon’s closest friend Jo. (If we are able to play two games, we will swap roles after the first) Each role has specific actions they are (or are not) able to take throughout the game, and we will play to find out how Simon and Jack’s relationship grows in physical and emotional intensity, and how they deal with the struggles in their lives.
### [ Monsterhearts 2: Forbearance ](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lcjg_l6jDrjqDBlHiD5)
[date=2019-05-02 time=22:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-03 time=01:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] We'll play in the setting of Forbearance, New Mexico, 1997, a dot-com boomtown haunted by digital monsters. In the new economy, locals rely on freelancing and service jobs. A kid with a bike can get a courier gig. A smart and savvy enough kid could swing a QA job at one of the startups. And that’s to say nothing of the demons. Daemons? It’s unclear whether they were born on the Net or whether they’re infernal opportunists, but Dark Powers haunt the modem lines, offering wealth and power to those who can do their bidding. What do they want? Maybe just chaos.
### [ Mutants in the Night: Unity](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_lEfyRzo03gLDcvgMx)
[date=2019-05-04 time=08:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-04 time=11:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] Unity Heights was a high tech, sleek neighborhood for the many "young professionals" working for the new headquarters of the shipping megacorp in the city. It was much celebrated, a seed of hope and renewal for the city.
That was 24 years ago. The seed? Corrupted.
Today, Unity Mutant Safe Zone are where the unwanted, the exploited, the acceptable target. The world is dying, the megacorp has changed headquarters again but still profits from exploitation of the inhabitants of Unity - perhaps even more as they are not even recognized as humans. The world crumbles away as capitalism keeps chugging along. You are mutants, the scapegoats for a crumbling system, blamed for everything; but you also have the tools to fix your communities and save your loved ones. As they fear you, they admit to the power for change your can wield.
### [ Dungeon World: Cold Ruins of Lastlife](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_hR5DxUC40ty7FKaUp)
[date=2019-05-05 time=08:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-05 time=11:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] Imagine grand cathedrals. Spires scraping the heavens. Statues of alabaster and silver. A song echoing through stone corridors. The light of hope ensconced in a thousand torches, keeping the darkest nights at bay. Then imagine it all fell. Grand cathedrals, silent and empty. Spires, crumbling and broken. Statues dirty and tarnished. Song, forgotten and lost. A thousand torches, cold and dark. That is the world of Lastlife.
### [ Dungeon World: Stuck in Jawbone](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_P9O-5K1K3XGV5Hcwr)
[date=2019-05-05 time=09:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-05 time=12:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] Where did the missing wizard go? What does the weeping ghost want? Who are the bandits hiding in the sewer? What's going on at the factory? _What is wrong with this place?_
You probably didn't plan to stay long in a dying mountain town full of smog and secrets. But here you are, so you might as well make the best of it and figure out what's going on. Maybe somebody will even pay you for it.

item.title: Opportunities to Play! Games with Open Seats Available 2019/04/29 thru 2019/05/05
item.dc:creator: @Big_Hammers
item.description:
@Big_Hammers wrote:

I really appreciate these posts. Due to my schedule I rarely can plan weeks ahead so these are my main source of games. Thanks for doing this!

Read full topic
item.source: Opportunities to Play! Games with Open Seats Available 2019/04/29 thru 2019/05/05

item.title: Opportunities to Play! Games with Open Seats Available 2019/04/29 thru 2019/05/05
item.dc:creator: @shane
item.description:
@shane wrote:

Hey folks!

In this post, we will highlight games for the upcoming week which have open seats and therefore the opportunity to add some more gaming fun to your week.

Cute Boys Holding Hands: An HGMO Hack

Monday, April 29, 2019 7:00 PM → Monday, April 29, 2019 10:30 PM
Cute Boys Holding Hands is a game about a budding relationship between two boys at a South Yorkshire grammar school in the Summer of 1984, at the height of the Miners Strike. In some ways polar opposites, the boys are united by their outsider status at the school. Between us, we will play the two boys, Simon and Jack, their English teacher Miss Rayne, and Simon’s closest friend Jo. (If we are able to play two games, we will swap roles after the first) Each role has specific actions they are (or are not) able to take throughout the game, and we will play to find out how Simon and Jack’s relationship grows in physical and emotional intensity, and how they deal with the struggles in their lives.

Never Tell Me the Odds: Ol’ Hallelujah

Tuesday, April 30, 2019 12:00 AM → Tuesday, April 30, 2019 3:00 AM
YOU ARE A SPACEFARING SCOUNDREL. You’ve blasted, cheated, swindled, double-crossed, charmed, and hyper- jumped your way across HALF THE GALAXY. But now, you’ve made a few bad decisions and gotten into some REAL TROUBLE. The one thing in all the universe that you really care about is in terrible danger, and keeping it safe might require the ULTIMATE SACRIFICE. Are you desperate enough to risk everything you have to SAVE WHAT MATTERS MOST?

Cute Boys Holding Hands: An HGMO Hack

Tuesday, April 30, 2019 7:00 PM → Tuesday, April 30, 2019 10:30 PM
Cute Boys Holding Hands is a game about a budding relationship between two boys at a South Yorkshire grammar school in the Summer of 1984, at the height of the Miners Strike. In some ways polar opposites, the boys are united by their outsider status at the school. Between us, we will play the two boys, Simon and Jack, their English teacher Miss Rayne, and Simon’s closest friend Jo. (If we are able to play two games, we will swap roles after the first) Each role has specific actions they are (or are not) able to take throughout the game, and we will play to find out how Simon and Jack’s relationship grows in physical and emotional intensity, and how they deal with the struggles in their lives.

Monsterhearts 2: Forbearance

Friday, May 3, 2019 2:00 AM → Friday, May 3, 2019 5:00 AM
We’ll play in the setting of Forbearance, New Mexico, 1997, a dot-com boomtown haunted by digital monsters. In the new economy, locals rely on freelancing and service jobs. A kid with a bike can get a courier gig. A smart and savvy enough kid could swing a QA job at one of the startups. And that’s to say nothing of the demons. Daemons? It’s unclear whether they were born on the Net or whether they’re infernal opportunists, but Dark Powers haunt the modem lines, offering wealth and power to those who can do their bidding. What do they want? Maybe just chaos.

Mutants in the Night: Unity

Saturday, May 4, 2019 12:00 PM → Saturday, May 4, 2019 3:00 PM
Unity Heights was a high tech, sleek neighborhood for the many “young professionals” working for the new headquarters of the shipping megacorp in the city. It was much celebrated, a seed of hope and renewal for the city.

That was 24 years ago. The seed? Corrupted.

Today, Unity Mutant Safe Zone are where the unwanted, the exploited, the acceptable target. The world is dying, the megacorp has changed headquarters again but still profits from exploitation of the inhabitants of Unity - perhaps even more as they are not even recognized as humans. The world crumbles away as capitalism keeps chugging along. You are mutants, the scapegoats for a crumbling system, blamed for everything; but you also have the tools to fix your communities and save your loved ones. As they fear you, they admit to the power for change your can wield.

Dungeon World: Cold Ruins of Lastlife

Sunday, May 5, 2019 12:00 PM → Sunday, May 5, 2019 3:00 PM
Imagine grand cathedrals. Spires scraping the heavens. Statues of alabaster and silver. A song echoing through stone corridors. The light of hope ensconced in a thousand torches, keeping the darkest nights at bay. Then imagine it all fell. Grand cathedrals, silent and empty. Spires, crumbling and broken. Statues dirty and tarnished. Song, forgotten and lost. A thousand torches, cold and dark. That is the world of Lastlife.

Dungeon World: Stuck in Jawbone

Sunday, May 5, 2019 1:00 PM → Sunday, May 5, 2019 4:00 PM
Where did the missing wizard go? What does the weeping ghost want? Who are the bandits hiding in the sewer? What’s going on at the factory? What is wrong with this place?

You probably didn’t plan to stay long in a dying mountain town full of smog and secrets. But here you are, so you might as well make the best of it and figure out what’s going on. Maybe somebody will even pay you for it.
